mods.abstract: Abstract image of three frogs against a textured background of short and frenetic horizontal lines. Each frog has a different overall pattern drawn over a mid-toned body. The frog in the front of the picture has open dots, the middle frog, a series of "v" or checkmarks and the frog in the back is decorated with dashes. Each frog has darker arm like appendages but no legs are visible. The print is vertically oriented.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
